content.json:
# ANF-AIOps Analytics Workbook

**Author:** Dwiref Sharma <DwirefS@SapientEdge.io>  
**Version:** 2.0.0  
**Last Updated:** 2025-07-18

Comprehensive analytics and monitoring workbook for Azure NetApp Files AI-Ops solution. This workbook provides detailed insights into system performance, user activity, security metrics, and operational efficiency.

---

parameters.name: Environment
parameters.query:
customDimensions
| where isnotempty(Environment)
| distinct tostring(Environment)
| sort by Environment asc

content.json:
## üìä System Overview

High-level metrics and health indicators for the ANF-AIOps system.

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| summarize 
    TotalRequests = count(),
    SuccessfulRequests = countif(success == true),
    FailedRequests = countif(success == false),
    AvgDuration = avg(duration),
    P95Duration = percentile(duration, 95),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(user_Id)
| extend 
    SuccessRate = round((SuccessfulRequests * 100.0) / TotalRequests, 2),
    ErrorRate = round((FailedRequests * 100.0) / TotalRequests, 2)
| project 
    ['Total Requests'] = TotalRequests,
    ['Success Rate (%)'] = SuccessRate,
    ['Error Rate (%)'] = ErrorRate,
    ['Avg Response Time (ms)'] = round(AvgDuration, 0),
    ['95th Percentile (ms)'] = round(P95Duration, 0),
    ['Active Users'] = UniqueUsers
content.title: System Health Metrics

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| summarize RequestCount = count() by bin(timestamp, {TimeRange:grain})
| render timechart
content.title: Request Volume Over Time

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| summarize 
    AvgDuration = avg(duration),
    P95Duration = percentile(duration, 95)
    by bin(timestamp, {TimeRange:grain})
| render timechart
content.title: Response Time Trends

content.json:
## ‚ö° Performance Analytics

Detailed performance metrics and bottleneck analysis.

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| extend OperationCategory = case(
    url contains "accounts", "Account Operations",
    url contains "pools", "Pool Operations",
    url contains "volumes", "Volume Operations",
    url contains "snapshots", "Snapshot Operations",
    "Other"
)
| summarize 
    Count = count(),
    AvgDuration = avg(duration),
    P95Duration = percentile(duration, 95),
    MaxDuration = max(duration),
    SuccessRate = round((countif(success == true) * 100.0) / count(), 2)
    by OperationCategory
| order by Count desc
content.title: Performance by Operation Category

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where duration > 5000  // Slow requests > 5 seconds
| project timestamp, name, duration, success, resultCode
| order by duration desc
| take 20
content.title: Slowest Operations (>5 seconds)

content.query:
exceptions
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| summarize ErrorCount = count() by type, bin(timestamp, {TimeRange:grain})
| render timechart
content.title: Error Trends Over Time

content.json:
## üë• User Activity & Engagement

User behavior patterns and system adoption metrics.

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "UserActivity"
| extend UserId = tostring(customDimensions.UserId)
| summarize 
    TotalUsers = dcount(UserId),
    TotalSessions = dcount(session_Id),
    TotalActions = count(),
    AvgActionsPerUser = round(count() / todouble(dcount(UserId)), 1)
| project 
    ['Active Users'] = TotalUsers,
    ['Total Sessions'] = TotalSessions,
    ['Total Actions'] = TotalActions,
    ['Avg Actions/User'] = AvgActionsPerUser
content.title: User Engagement Summary

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "UserActivity"
| extend 
    UserId = tostring(customDimensions.UserId),
    Action = tostring(customDimensions.Action)
| summarize UniqueUsers = dcount(UserId) by bin(timestamp, {TimeRange:grain}), Action
| render timechart
content.title: User Activity by Action Type

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "UserActivity"
| extend UserId = tostring(customDimensions.UserId)
| summarize SessionCount = dcount(session_Id) by UserId
| summarize UserCount = count() by SessionCount
| extend UserType = case(
    SessionCount == 1, "One-time Users",
    SessionCount <= 5, "Occasional Users",
    SessionCount <= 20, "Regular Users",
    "Power Users"
)
| summarize TotalUsers = sum(UserCount) by UserType
| render piechart
content.title: User Engagement Distribution

content.json:
## üîí Security Monitoring

Security events, authentication patterns, and threat detection.

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name in ("AuthenticationSuccess", "AuthenticationFailed")
| summarize 
    TotalAttempts = count(),
    SuccessfulLogins = countif(name == "AuthenticationSuccess"),
    FailedLogins = countif(name == "AuthenticationFailed")
| extend 
    SuccessRate = round((SuccessfulLogins * 100.0) / TotalAttempts, 2),
    FailureRate = round((FailedLogins * 100.0) / TotalAttempts, 2)
| project 
    ['Total Login Attempts'] = TotalAttempts,
    ['Successful Logins'] = SuccessfulLogins,
    ['Failed Logins'] = FailedLogins,
    ['Success Rate (%)'] = SuccessRate,
    ['Failure Rate (%)'] = FailureRate
content.title: Authentication Summary

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "AuthenticationFailed"
| extend ClientIP = tostring(customDimensions.ClientIP)
| where isnotempty(ClientIP)
| summarize FailureCount = count() by ClientIP
| where FailureCount > 5  // Potential brute force
| order by FailureCount desc
| take 10
content.title: Suspicious Login Activity (>5 failures)

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where resultCode in (401, 403)  // Unauthorized/Forbidden
| summarize UnauthorizedRequests = count() by bin(timestamp, {TimeRange:grain})
| render timechart
content.title: Unauthorized Access Attempts

content.json:
## üóÇÔ∏è Azure NetApp Files Operations

Detailed analytics for ANF resource management operations.

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "ANF_Operation"
| extend 
    Operation = tostring(customDimensions.Operation),
    Resource = tostring(customDimensions.Resource),
    Success = tobool(customDimensions.Success)
| summarize 
    TotalOperations = count(),
    SuccessfulOps = countif(Success == true),
    FailedOps = countif(Success == false)
    by Operation
| extend SuccessRate = round((SuccessfulOps * 100.0) / TotalOperations, 1)
| order by TotalOperations desc
content.title: ANF Operations Summary

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "ANF_Operation"
| extend Operation = tostring(customDimensions.Operation)
| summarize OperationCount = count() by bin(timestamp, {TimeRange:grain}), Operation
| render timechart
content.title: ANF Operations Trends

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "ANF_Operation"
| extend 
    Operation = tostring(customDimensions.Operation),
    Success = tobool(customDimensions.Success)
| where Success == false
| summarize FailureCount = count() by Operation
| order by FailureCount desc
| take 10
| render barchart
content.title: Top 10 Failed Operations

content.json:
## ü§ñ Teams Bot Analytics

Microsoft Teams bot conversation patterns and AI effectiveness.

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "TeamsBot_Conversation"
| extend 
    Intent = tostring(customDimensions.Intent),
    Success = tobool(customDimensions.Success),
    UserId = tostring(customDimensions.UserId)
| summarize 
    TotalConversations = count(),
    SuccessfulConversations = countif(Success == true),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserId)
    by Intent
| extend SuccessRate = round((SuccessfulConversations * 100.0) / TotalConversations, 1)
| order by TotalConversations desc
content.title: Bot Conversations by Intent

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "TeamsBot_Conversation"
| extend Success = tobool(customDimensions.Success)
| summarize ConversationCount = count() by bin(timestamp, {TimeRange:grain}), Success
| render timechart
content.title: Bot Conversation Success Rate

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "TeamsBot_Conversation"
| extend 
    Intent = tostring(customDimensions.Intent),
    Success = tobool(customDimensions.Success)
| where Success == false
| summarize FailureCount = count() by Intent
| order by FailureCount desc
| take 10
| render piechart
content.title: Failed Conversation Intents
